website_summaries.verdict: Fairly affordable, highly detailed, and with a huge selection of other characters to choose from, these flexible figures are a fantastic toy for younger Dragon Ball fans to play with.
pros: Includes 4 hands and the head of Shenron, the dragon
Many other Dragon Ball characters available
cons: The only way to get a complete Shenron is to buy multiple figures

customer_reviews.title: Good size.  Good Price.  Good Delivery
customer_reviews.text: great toy size (6 inches not 3), great price and package is sealed. Delivered in a timely manner. I am happy with this seller. I will try to buy the other figures of the collection. pieces do not fall off with articulation. this is it. The figure is a nice size. Too many sellers on Amazon selling overpriced collectibles. Your child/big kid/adult collector will love this. I will update later after my son has played with it.
customer_reviews.author: quasilyon

customer_reviews.title: cheap and easily broken
customer_reviews.text: those poseable legs are a problem. the piece they click onto is easily broken during play. My son broke this action figure, during play, when he did a play kick and the leg popped off. He said "don't worry mom, it will click back on." Then, when he realized that the piece to click the leg back onto had broken off, he started to cry. He is 9 yrs old and this was his Christmas present. This also happened to his Jiren action figure as well.......on the same left leg. This is a factory defect.
customer_reviews.author: kristinab31

customer_reviews.title: Budget Figure with Upscale Quality
customer_reviews.text: It can be difficult to find quality DBZ figures on a budget. Figuarts are great, but don't represent a price point that everyone can afford. These Dragon Star figures are an excellent cross-section of being budget friendly and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler H

customer_reviews.title: Look great!!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves these figures! This one looked really good but I don’t like how it’s has many pieces that can come apart...hands, feet, belt, etc. my grandson is rough & is forever losing some of the pieces. I guess these are really for older kids.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Aleman

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 6 year old. Works well as a toy. Would also be a great collectible item for adults. The exchangeable pieces and the toy itself are about the palm of my hand and I’m an average hight woman. The body parks can be broken easily if your child plays rough and makes toys fight but the good part is they are ball assembled so can snap right back on!
customer_reviews.author: YaaNiaa

customer_reviews.title: Item as described
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this figure for my friend's son as a gift because he loves Dragon ball a lot, a die hard fans, should I put it. When he saw this figure, he was so excited and my friend even told me that her son slept with this figure. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Action Figure
customer_reviews.text: I love Dragon Ball Z and it makes me so happy to have the figures in my home... I collected these as a child and I’m even happier to have them as an adult. It’s worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Wasted money.
customer_reviews.text: Immediately broke...leg basically slipped off. Not even a couple days worth of play.
customer_reviews.author: M. Charles

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy figures
customer_reviews.text: This line of figures is very poorly made and have oddly proportioned heads. Won’t be buying any more of these.
customer_reviews.author: CN

customer_reviews.title: there are a great toy, but needs more work
customer_reviews.text: the alternative for sh figuarts,there are a great toy,but needs more work,bigger,better articulation,better paint job,specially for collector.
customer_reviews.author: hector a herrera

customer_reviews.title: Winner
customer_reviews.text: My 10 y.o son absolutely love dbz possible figures. These are easy to pose and remove hands.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy_of_3

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, everything goes fine, amazing figure, good detailed and with and excellent motion range, very well packaged :)...
customer_reviews.author: wagner gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great detail, worth buying the whole set to make the dragon.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Just as pictured and described. My son loved opening it for his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Nice Figure!
customer_reviews.text: Nice figure. Seems sturdy. I bought it for my kid as a reward for doing well in school.
customer_reviews.author: L. Henry Dowell-Playwright

customer_reviews.title: Good figure in general but the face looked kinda small
customer_reviews.text: Good figure in general but the face looked kinda small. His head doesn't look up the way up to. But still then figure looks decent
customer_reviews.author: alpan

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely love it i couldnt be auny happier i though it was going ro be like freaza but nope it was way better and both toys are pretty good material can wait to buy the rest of the set

customer_reviews.title: Authentic
customer_reviews.text: Authentic, great quality. My son is a dragon ball Z fanatic and was beyond pleased with this!

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: It is not the product they describe in the publication, it does not move nor was it original

customer_reviews.title: Great figure. Has good details
customer_reviews.text: Great figure. Has good details. Gave it to a friend and he loved it, was also happy it came with extra hands.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved it so that made me happy... was extremely small but he loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and buy
customer_reviews.text: It was for my son for Christmas and he loved it. It has alot of small pieces but the figure itself bends and moves so he can play the way he likes.
customer_reviews.author: Catonia shirley

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My son loved these action figures and they stand up to the rough play of a two year old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth :)
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice and smooth to move, it’s great for display as the figure has many joints and is great to play with.

customer_reviews.title: Best in the series
customer_reviews.text: It's really good action figure that I bought for my nephew, he loves it so much.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift.
customer_reviews.text: Package came as described. Perfect for my son this Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Articulation is limited
customer_reviews.text: Good figure it came fast and I had no problems with it

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great toy, better than others but the paint on the hair scratched off a bit too soon.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Excatly what I order and know my kid will love it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing figure! Nice sculpt, and came with a Shenron head which I didn't expect!

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Came quick and the box has no damage. It’s a gift so I won’t be the one opening it but it looks great

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up from grandson
customer_reviews.text: This action figure was purchased for my grandson and he loves it.

customer_reviews.title: it looks like someone opened the box

product_meta.title: Dragon Ball Super - Dragon Stars Super Saiyan Goku Figure (Series 1)
product_meta.description: Color:S1 Super Saiyan Goku| Size:Series 1The Dragon Stars Series is comprised of highly detailed and articulated figures from Dragon Ball Super. Standing tall at 6.5“, having 16 or more points of articulation, and a set of additional hands, these figures can be posed in over 9,000 positions. Characters in Series 1 includes: Super Saiyan Goku, Vegeta, Beerus, Super Saiyan Vegeta, Frieza, and Goku. Each figure also includes a buildable piece that can be combined to form the legendary dragon Shenron, when all 6 are collected. Premium collector’s packaging. Each figure sold separately.
feature_bullets: The Dragon Stars Series is comprised of highly detailed and articulated figures from Dragon Ball Super
Standing tall at 6.5“, having 16 or more points of articulation, and a set of additional hands, these figures can be posed in over 9,000 positions
Characters in Series 1 includes: Super Saiyan Goku, Vegeta, Beerus, Super Saiyan Vegeta, Frieza, and Goku
Each figure also includes a buildable piece that can be combined to form the legendary dragon Shenron, when all 6 are collected

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,879 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
